description:
Yuma must figure out a way to defeat the mysterious and all-knowing Fortuno if he wants to save his friends, his Number Card and his soul!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chaos XYZ Change! Kibou no Hikari Hope Ray!!
Chaos XYZ Change! Light of Hope: Hope Ray!!
カオスエクシーズ・チェンジ! 希望の光ホープ・レイ!!
